reviewText: A great documentary about how the governments surveillance of its people and the cost of peopleThat stood against it.
Title: For the Record, Episode 1: Surveillance State

reviewText: about as motivating as a shark bite like you've all had one of those- this is just for the money because you'll never stop driving or using daily toys to keep you happy- bitch all you want want, the government will always be there and all you can do is vote- the rest of the time you should try reading books or walking, smelling the roses
Title: For the Record, Episode 1: Surveillance State

reviewText: You just thought you were shocked about the NSA spying revelation! You don't know half the story. This is as Paul Harvey would say..."the rest of the story". These brave former government workers are blowing the whistle on what goes on. It takes a special person to want to know, what they DON'T want to know, and to hear, what they DON'T want to hear. It's way past time to turn the lights on and dispel the darkness that would take away our freedom. Great documentary that every freedom loving American should see and show to everyone you know, who will be willing to face the reality that has become our New America. To be forewarned is to be forearmed! We all need to wake up and step up to the plate to protect our freedom, and support those who will stand up with us and for us! Once it's gone, it can not be regained. Remember this quote from one of our founding fathers, "Those who would sacrifice their freedom for security, will have neither." Another quote from Benjamin Franklin..."If you make yourself a sheep, you will be eaten by wolves." Inform yourself! Stand up! Speak up, or give up, these are the only 2 choices we have.
summary: Great documentary every American should see! Get informed, then inform others. Get this DVD!
Title: For the Record, Episode 1: Surveillance State

reviewText: I like the truth and the facts as they really are not a bunch of made up data like we hear so much of today.  This spells out how vulnerable we are and is a warning about things to come.
Title: For the Record, Episode 1: Surveillance State

reviewText: I learned many facts that I did not know however, none really shocked me.  It is obvious that a lot of time, effort and work was put into this presentation and I appreciate that.
Title: For the Record, Episode 1: Surveillance State

reviewText: Thank God for Glenn Beck and all the good work he does.  I wish more so-called religious leaders got involved.  Excellent video
Title: For the Record, Episode 1: Surveillance State

reviewText: More evidence that the Federal government is completely out of control and a danger to all Americans.  It also further tarnishes my opinion of George W. Bush, a man I used to respect.  How much more is going on covertly in the Obama administration with the threats they have levied against whistle blowers?  Hearing what these people have been through, who is going to be willing to put themselves through h*ll to blow the whistle?  Absolutely frightening.
Title: For the Record, Episode 1: Surveillance State
